rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance that adheres to Vastu principles for positive energy flow. The hall acts as a transitional space from the garage area.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Dual-car garage designed with easy access and ample parking space. Walls are constructed according to local norms ensuring structural integrity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A Chettinad-style kitchen featuring traditional motifs and efficient layout. It is placed in the southeast direction as per Vastu principles to promote prosperity.

rooms.name: Living/Dining Area
rooms.description: A combined living and dining area that opens towards the courtyard for natural ventilation and light. Traditional Chettinad design elements are integrated in decor and layout.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: An open balcony adjoining the living area for an outdoor feel and additional light, designed with local architectural style influences.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact utility space for storing cleaning supplies and appliances. Located conveniently near the kitchen following Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: The main entrance is positioned to welcome positive energy according to Vastu principles, with a covered verandah.
The garage door opens towards the driveway for easy access and is designed to align with local building norms.
Rooms have strategically placed windows to ensure ample natural light, ventilation, and compliance with Vastu guidelines.
Internal doors facilitating smooth movement between spaces, designed to maximize functionality and adherence to building codes.

notes.vastu_adherence: The layout has been thoughtfully arranged with respect to Vastu principles ensuring that the entrance faces north, kitchen in southeast, and living areas in the northeast. Traditional Chettinad motifs and textures are integrated throughout.
notes.compliance: Local building norms have been adhered to in structural design, space allocation, and safety regulations for a two-story studio apartment on a 30x50 feet plot.
